member.name: IDataObjectAsyncCapability.EndOperation
member.summary: Notifies the data object that the asynchronous data extraction has ended.
member.param: Indicates the outcome of the data extraction. Set this value to S_OK if successful, or a COM error code otherwise.

A DROPEFFECT value that indicates the result of an optimized move. This should be the same value that would be passed to the data object as a CFSTR_PERFORMEDDROPEFFECT format with a normal data extraction operation.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDataObjectAsyncCapability.GetAsyncMode
member.summary: Called by a drop target to determine whether the data object supports asynchronous data extraction.
member.param: VARIANT_TRUE if an asynchronous operation is supported; otherwise, VARIANT_FALSE.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDataObjectAsyncCapability.InOperation
member.summary: Called by the drop source to determine whether the target is extracting data asynchronously.
member.param: VARIANT_TRUE if data extraction is being handled asynchronously; otherwise, VARIANT_FALSE.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDataObjectAsyncCapability.SetAsyncMode
member.summary: Called by a drop source to specify whether the data object supports asynchronous data extraction.
member.param: VARIANT_TRUE if an asynchronous operation is supported; otherwise, VARIANT_FALSE. The default value is VARIANT_FALSE.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDataObjectAsyncCapability.StartOperation
member.summary: Called by a drop target to indicate that asynchronous data extraction is starting.
member.param: Reserved. Set this value to nullptr.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Enables interfaces that are usually synchronous to function asynchronously.
summary.div: Note This interface is the current, renamed version of IAsyncOperation.
